item.title: Linux tools that you never knew you needed
item.description: bat - (cat alternative) bat: A cat(1) clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration. Example: fd - (find alternative) fd: a simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find. Examples: httpie - (wget/curl alternative) httpie: a user-friendly command-line HTTP client for the API era. It comes with JSON support, syntax highlighting, persistent sessions, wget-like downloads, plugins, and more. Examples: # Hello world $ http httpie.io/hello # Custom HTTP method, HTTP headers and JSON data $ http PUT pie.
